name: Mitosis (itch)
description:
You are a little cell, happily dividing away. You do your best to keep your DNA in order, but sometimes mutations just occur. You shouldn't allow them to spread very far though.

It's a game about area control, I think. Initially I had other plans but this is what I ended up with.
You control it by clicking. Use Escape to bring up a menu. I need sleep.
